Html:
Hi,

I have used this component for over 1 year now, and have just upgraded my systems to VS 2010 / .NET 4.

The system will run within VS but when i build and install on client machine i get the singleton error.

I have the settings in the app.config as requried, but i noticed in the MESSAGES window the following :

 

Could not find schema information for the element 'supportedRuntime'

Could not find schema information for the attribute 'version'

Could not find schema information for the attribute 'useLegacyV2RuntimeActivationPolicy'

Could not find schema information for the attribute 'sku'

 

Is this preventing the details from the app.config to be built and then causing the error on the clients machine?

I have not come across these warnings before ?

Can anyone please provide some help.

Thanks in advance.

Paul

Fixed by problem,  the  APPLICATION.EXE.CONFIG file that was created didn't contain the contents of the APP.CONFIG

so i put the details in there and its working ok now.
